page.title: 10ROXWELL KENNELS(CONT>
page.content: The workers take them out for a 20 minute walk night and morning every day for exercise. Some dogs are entered for shows including Crufts at Olympia in January. They were awarded a 3rd prize one year and Mr. Dobson has been invited to judge at Crufts. They export about 100 every year mainly to America and South Africa and the most common breed is the German Shepherd. It is an excellent place to visit even if you are just passing through Roxwell. You could just pop in and have a look around. The owners are friendly and knowledgeable and the place is kept neat and tidy. The dogs are happy and noisy.
